title: Inquiry-Based Science Lesson Design Simulation Training for Pre-Service Elementary Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Core theories of elementary science education and general lesson design principles
context.additional_context: Pre-service teachers develop inquiry lesson design and execution skills by interacting with avatars role-playing elementary students in a VR environment.

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can integrate inquiry activities of varying levels (guided, structured, open-ended) into lesson design.
Learners can accurately construct over 80% of higher-order questions (analysis, evaluation, creation levels) that promote scientific thinking.
Learners can iteratively improve their lesson design prototypes three times based on peer feedback and simulation data.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
